channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLmindYourBusiness
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLmindYourBusiness, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: UnitedHealth Group Profits Fall To $2.3 Billion But Recovery Signs Emerge
item.description: UnitedHealth Group’s third-quarter net income fell to $2.3 billion as the provider of health benefits works to recover from rising medical costs.

item.title: Don’t Make Nuclear Power Another Failed Government Program
item.description: The last thing a reviving American nuclear industry needs is federal government subsidies.

item.title: An AI Boom Is Catapulting Markets And Raising Fears A Bubble Is Near
item.description: AI investment is driving Wall Street’s biggest rally in years. Forbes’ expert contributors explore whether it's a rising wave or an AI bubble.

item.title: ‘Fireballs’ Will Soon Swarm Around A Supermoon — Here’s When To Watch
item.description: When, where and how to see bright "fireballs" cut through strong moonlight as the Southern Taurid meteor shower peaks.
